amendment.description: An amendment printed in the Congressional Record of July 11, as amendment No. 35, that requires private companies that extract minerals from Federal lands to pay an 8% royalty on the value of the minerals produced.

action.text: Mr. Pombo raised a point of order against the Owens amendment (A032). Mr. Pombo stated that the amendment was not in order because its effect on the bill would result in legislation on an appropriations measure and as such, violated the House Rules. The Chair sustained the point of order.
